org.appkit.registry
Class Colors

java.lang.Object
  org.appkit.registry.Colors

public final class Colors
extends Object

SWT Color cache/registry
Creates, assigns and caches Colors. Colors can be set to the foreground or background of a Control. Use of the color is de-registered when the control is disposed, when another Image is set via this registry or manually via the putBack methods.
This uses a simple counter to keep of track of usage. If it drops to 0, the color is disposed.
